parameters.name: Forward
parameters.description: True for forward direction, false for reverse

parameters.name: WallThickness
parameters.description: True for forward feature direction, false for reverse

title: IExtrudeFeatureData2.SetWallThickness
description: Sets the wall thickness of the thin extrusion feature in a forward or reverse direction.
signature:
void SetWallThickness( 
   System.Boolean
Forward
,
   System.Double
WallThickness
)

parameters.name: Forward
parameters.description: True for forward direction, false for reverse

parameters.name: WallThickness
parameters.description: True for forward feature direction, false for reverse

remarks: This method is relevant only for thin features.
